definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: Now you're the inventor of the Suck Kut right?
sentences.chinese: 那，你是吸入式理髮器的發明人，對吧？

sentences.english: Scientists or inventors are these which are adept in selecting or cooking.
sentences.chinese: 科技家們和發明人是在擇選並且煮是擅長的那些。

sentences.english: The inventor is a protegee' of the Advanced Energy Institute.
sentences.chinese: 發明人是被保護人的先進能源學會。

sentences.english: For the inventor, that may be a reasonable trade-off.
sentences.chinese: 對於發明人而言，這可能是一個合理的交換條件。

sentences.english: Machiavelli is the founder, the discoverer, the inventor of the modern state.
sentences.chinese: 馬奇亞維利是創始人，發明人，他發明了現代國家。

sentences.english: She goes on to speak to the inventor, Mr Wu.
sentences.chinese: 她之後採訪了這種機器的發明人吳先生。

sentences.english: The inventor shall have the right to be mentioned as such in the patent.
sentences.chinese: 發明人有權要求在專利證書上記載自己是發明人。

sentences.english: The inventor shall have the right to be mentioned as such in the patent.
sentences.chinese: 發明人有權要求在專利證書上記載自己是發明人。

sentences.english: The Wrights were triumphant aircraft inventors.
sentences.chinese: 萊特兄弟是成功的飛機發明人。

sentences.english: Someone says that the contrivance person of the coffee of Ireland is all Berlin the bartender of the airport.
sentences.chinese: 有人說愛爾蘭咖啡的發明人是都柏林機場的酒保。
